visual_desc: SHOT 1 (POV - MARA) - Transition complete. <Mara> awakens abruptly, standing on broken, dark digital cobblestones. The environment is a surreal landscape where glowing MEGA-CIRCUIT BOARDS intersect with canals of dark, shimmering liquid. <Mara> looks down at her hands; they FLICKER rapidly between solid flesh and a jagged, orange wireframe skeleton. She is disoriented.
